text: The Fiat Doblò is a car produced by Fiat in two generations since 2000. == First generation (2000–2009) == === Models === File:Fiat Doblo front.JPG|5-door mpv (Doblò) File:Fiat Doblò tetto rialzato.JPG|5-door mpv (Doblò) File:Fiat Doblo Cargo XXL Facelift rear.JPG|5-door panel van (Doblò Cargo Maxi XXL) File:Fiat Doblo Facelift 20090808 front.JPG|5-door mpv (Doblò facelift) File:Wheee!!! My new car!.jpg|5-door crossover (Brazilian Doblò Adventure) === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.2 8V 48 kW (65 hp) * 1.2 16V 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.4 8V 57 kW (78 hp) * 1.6 16V 76 kW (103 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.3 Multijet 16V 51 kW (69 hp), 55 kW (75 hp) and 62 kW (84 hp) * 1.9 D 8V 46 kW (63 hp) * 1.9 JTD 8V 74 kW (101 hp) * 1.9 Multijet 8V 77 kW (105 hp) and 88 kW (120 hp) ==== BiPower engines ==== * 1.6 Natural Power 16V CNG 76 kW (103 hp) == Second generation (2009–present) == === Models === File:Fiat Doblò second generation 2010.jpg|5-door mpv (Doblò) File:Fiat Doblò II rear 20100402.jpg|5-door panel van (Doblò Cargo) === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.4 16V 70 kW (95 hp) * 1.4 T-Jet 88 kW (120 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.3 Multijet 16V 66 kW (90 hp) * 1.6 Multijet 16V 66 kW (90 hp) and 77 kW (105 hp) * 2.0 Multijet 16V 99 kW (135 hp) ==== BiPower engines ==== * 1.4 Turbo Natural Power 16V CNG 88 kW (120 hp) Doblò Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Fiat Doblò
